body: Roughly back in October, 2019, we got an 'English, or rather, Engrish" translation of this tank, that is an insult to the greatness that is Sabashi Renya. Rescue Operation (code name: "DELIVER US FROM ENGRISH!") ... ENGAGE!

Alas, ... unless they're migrating to a new site or something, it seems that Triple Seven Scans are no longer in operation, so that any continued English translation of this work (i.e., Chapter 4 to end) will have to be undertaken by (*cough-cough*) "other means".
